comment.author: 85572475@N00
comment._content: So that's what a Cossack soldier looked like.

comment.author: 88025703@N00
comment._content: Looked even more "impressive" when they were pressing passing urban poor between their horses and the building walls along the street. Sweet guys.

comment.author: 17842180@N00
comment._content: There were many different Cossack "hosts" in Russia. The ones in the photo above were Don Cossacks (the most numerous among the various Cossack "hosts".)
